items.text: driven to mid-off
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: stays back to a length ball and punches to midwicket
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Gayle to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short, wide, cut to deep point
items.postText: Time for a drinks break. Both teams could use this - Bangladesh to catch their breath, and West Indies to scratch their heads.
items.shortText: Gayle to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: draws him forward and beats the outside edge
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: worked to point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: punched to long-off, past the bowler diving to his right
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: slider on leg, clipped into the on side
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: pitched up on middle and leg, driven down to long-off
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short, backs away and cuts to the bowler
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length, sliding in, tries to work it off the pads and gets a little inside edge
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tries to force a sweep and loses shape as the ball pings him on the stomach area
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: defended back
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: slides down the leg side
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: length on the stumps, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full, driven back
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: gets down for a sweep and ekes it out to fine leg
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, 1 leg bye

items.text: ooh, fends dangerously at a back of a length delivery that breaks away and gets beaten
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on the stumps, driven down
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, bunted back
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven to point
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: comes down the ground and carves it through the right of extra cover. Rovman Powell runs across from sweeper cover and casually gets down to let his escape past his fingers
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs
